mapper.sql: tys.teacher_id as "teacherId", tys.year, tys.student_sum as "studentSum", tys.student_ids as "studentIds", tys.review_tId as "reviewTeacherId", rs.name as "reviewTeacherName", u.name as "teacherInfo.name", et.node as "teacherInfo.teacher.node", tyr.review_flag as "teacherInfo.teacher.reviewFlag"

LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id = tys.teacher_id LEFT JOIN expand_teacher et on et.t_id = tys.teacher_id LEFT JOIN system_parameter sp on sp.id = u.sysYear_paramId LEFT JOIN teacher_year_review tyr on tyr.teacher_id = tys.teacher_id and tyr.year = sp.param_value LEFT JOIN sys_user rs on rs.id = tys.review_tId
